name: Jan Allebach
content: Jan P. Allebach - Elmore Family School of Electrical and Computer Engineering - Purdue University Jan P. Allebach Distinguished Professor Emeritus of Electrical and Computer Engineering Campus: West Lafayette Office Phone: +1 765-494-3535 E-mail: allebach@purdue.edu Address Purdue University Elmore Family School of Electrical and Computer Engineering Max W and Maileen Brown Family Hall 465 Northwestern Ave. West Lafayette, Indiana 47907-2035 Degrees BS, University of Delaware, 1972 MS, Princeton University, 1975 PhD, Princeton University, 1976 Research Electronic imaging systems, image capture and rendering, color image processing, image quality, document imaging Areas of Interest Communications, Networking, Signal & Image Processing Indicates primary area for this faculty member. Note that a few faculty members have more than one primary area.
